item.title: L.A. Designer Clare Vivier On Creating Hollywood’s Favorite Wrap Gifts and Her Silver Lake Flagship’s Chic Makeover
item.description: The talent behind accessories label Clare V. shares the stories behind her most star-loved bags and more of her favorite things.
